traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Extraordinary Leap
entries: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to move 3 feet.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Sticky Leg
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and is {@condition grappled} until it escapes (escape DC 12). The steeder can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at a time.
